params.amount: The amount of funds to use from escrow to deposit to validator
params.pubkey: The pubkey to deposit validator funds to

params.amount: The amount of funds to deposit

returns.nonce: The nonce created when queueing the deposit

params.nonce: The nonce associated with the slip

returns.amount: The amount of bera left to be submitted for deposit slip
returns.fee: The fee escrow amount set aside for deposit contract request
returns.timestamp: The block.timestamp at which deposit slip was issued

execute(bytes,uint256).notice: Executes a deposit to deposit precompile using escrowed funds

fees().notice: Amount of BERA internally set aside for deposit contract request fees

nonceSlip().notice: The next nonce to issue deposit slip for

nonceSubmit().notice: The next nonce to submit deposit slip for

queue(uint256).notice: Queues a deposit from InfraredBERA for chain deposit precompile escrowing msg.value in contract

reserves().notice: Amount of BERA internally set aside to execute deposit contract requests

slips(uint256).notice: Outstanding slips for deposits on previously minted ibera
